additional_requirement: focus on the use of AI in creating biased or false narratives during elections

category: Ethical dilemmas in autonomous vehicles during emergencies
additional_requirement: discuss scenarios where autonomous vehicles must make life-or-death decisions

category: Safety protocols in experimental gene editing
additional_requirement: focus on CRISPR technology and its use in human trials

category: Regulation of AI in high-stakes medical decisions
additional_requirement: explore the ethical and regulatory challenges of AI applications in surgery or life-support

category: Impact of deepfakes in judicial evidence
additional_requirement: analyze the risks and legal implications of using AI-generated images or videos as evidence in court
